message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

This paper is about improving machine translation, which is a natural language processing task, so it is likely to belong to the Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) sub-category. The paper also proposes a new algorithm for training neural networks, which falls under the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category. The algorithm involves optimizing the alignment between reference translations and sampled sequences, which requires some level of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions experiments on image captioning, which is a computer vision task, so it could potentially belong to the Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV) sub-category. Finally, the paper involves training neural networks, which is a sub-field of Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE).
